configurations.name: DEV
configurations.arguments: -sname ejabberd@localhost +K true +P 250000 -s ejabberd -ejabberd config \"_build/dev/rel/ejabberd/conf/ejabberd.yml\" -ejabberd log_path \"_build/dev/rel/ejabberd/logs/ejabberd.log\" -mnesia dir \"_build/dev/rel/ejabberd/database\"

configurations.name: RELIVE
configurations.arguments: -sname ejabberd@localhost +K true +P 250000 -s ejabberd -ejabberd config \"_build/relive/conf/ejabberd.yml\" -ejabberd log_path \"_build/relive/logs/ejabberd.log\" -mnesia dir \"_build/relive/database\"
